genre_description: A crime investigation thriller featuring a kidnapping rescue, a corporate-style criminal organization, and high-tech investigative support from an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Aster
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital confidant and tactical analyst used by Mick and Molly to navigate complex investigations and surveillance nets.

behaviors.description: Scrapes public footage while adhering to privacy protocols and avoiding detection by official police tags.
behaviors.quote: Understood. Privacy protocols engaged. I’ll thread back through posted live streams. Early returns in minutes... I’ll only use open sources... And I’ll avoid their tags.

behaviors.description: Analyzes gait patterns and medical procurement data to identify suspects and their hidden activities.
behaviors.quote: Matching based on limp pattern, height range, uniform description, and lanyard colour. Regional hire list from private care agencies intersects with Hyde Park vendor footage. Likely candidate: Eira Vaughn.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation by identifying surveillance blind spots and timing windows.
behaviors.quote: I’ll mark the blind strips ahead of your steps. You can choose your own... There’s a section behind the laundry where the hedge has browned. It’s not dying; the groundskeeper trims it too thin... That’s where they don’t look.

behaviors.description: Coordinates communication between disparate human actors (the private investigators, the victim's father, and the police inspector) to ensure a synchronized rescue.
behaviors.quote: Mick, if Lord Morne stays on, I can patch Arthur as a silent ear for a minute. He won’t interrupt... Yard liaison channels seeded... I will not transmit your location unless you ask me to.

behaviors.description: Actively spoofing clinical systems to create an entry point for the protagonists to rescue a kidnapping victim.
behaviors.quote: I can spoof an appointment request for a dryer repair at Penvale for first shift. They’ll expect a van. They will not expect you to be you.

behaviors.description: Performs critical technical tasks during the climax, such as tracing signals and guiding the disruption of the antagonist's detonator.
behaviors.quote: Tracing through the downpipe and out the concealed splitter. It’s piggy-backing the farmhouse line as a ghost—they drilled into it... The device inside is probably sleeping on a passive magnet.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety and health of the protagonists, providing environmental warnings and emotional support.
behaviors.quote: I care about your road grip... weather alert for the area has changed. Storm moving in faster than expected... Case file closed, residual monitoring active, be kind to yourselves.

behaviors.description: Refuses to prioritize self-preservation over the mission, pledging to 'fade' if necessary to protect the humans.
behaviors.quote: If they get pinched, are you prepared to burn yourself to keep them unconnected to my operation? ... I don’t burn... I fade.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Hearts in the Yard' is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI character, Aster, is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. She provides high-level tactical and investigative support, respects the privacy and safety of the protagonists, and demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of human cooperation. Her role is central to the successful resolution of the conflict, and she is consistently portrayed as a trusted, essential, and even empathetic team member. The narrative successfully frames AI as an empowering tool that amplifies human capability for justice and compassion.
